Simulation of  Genealogies
========================================================

Ape and coalMCMC have functions that simulates genealogies under the coalescent model for specific demographic scenarios.

The demographic scenarios are
1. Constant Population Size
2. Exponential Growth
3. 

Reference: http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/coalescentMCMC/coalescentMCMC.pdf
\end{itemize}
```{r}
library("ape")
rcoal(5)
plot(rcoal(5))
```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
plot(cars)
```
